text.exordium.title: Exordium
text.exordium.enableNametagScreenBufferi: Enable/Disable buffering nametags on the screen
text.exordium.targetFPSNameTags.tooltip: The target framerate for nametags on the screen
text.exordium.setting.chat.fps.tooltip: The maximum framerate for the chat overlay
text.exordium.setting.chat.forceblend.to: Force on texture blending for the chat overlay. Might fix some issues with other mods.
Force the chat to update every possible update frame(keeping in mind the fps limit). Might fix some issues with other mods.
text.exordium.setting.debug.fps.tooltip: The maximum framerate for the F3 overlay
text.exordium.setting.debug.forceblend.t: Force on texture blending for the F3 overlay. Might fix some issues with other mods.
text.exordium.setting.health.fps.tooltip: The maximum framerate for the health/hunger/armor overlay
Force on texture blending for the health/hunger/armor overlay. Might fix some issues with other mods.
text.exordium.setting.health.forceupdate: Force the health/hunger/armor overlay to update every possible update frame(keeping in mind the fps limit). Might fix some issues with other mods.
text.exordium.setting.hotbar.fps.tooltip: The maximum framerate for the hotbar
Force on texture blending for the hotbar. Might fix some issues with other mods.
text.exordium.setting.hotbar.forceupdate: Force the hotbar to update every possible update frame(keeping in mind the fps limit). Might fix some issues with other mods.
text.exordium.setting.experience.fps.too: The maximum framerate for the experience bar/level number
text.exordium.setting.experience.enabled: Enable/Disable buffering the experience bar/level number
text.exordium.setting.experience.forcebl: Force on texture blending for the experience bar/level number. Might fix some issues with other mods.
text.exordium.setting.experience.forceup: Force the experience bar/level number to update every possible update frame(keeping in mind the fps limit). Might fix some issues with other mods.
text.exordium.setting.scoreboard.fps.too: The maximum framerate for the scoreboard
text.exordium.setting.scoreboard.forcebl: Force on texture blending for the scoreboard. Might fix some issues with other mods.
text.exordium.setting.scoreboard.forceup: Force the scoreboard to update every possible update frame(keeping in mind the fps limit). Might fix some issues with other mods.
text.exordium.setting.tablist.fps.toolti: The maximum framerate for the tablist
text.exordium.setting.tablist.forceblend: Force on texture blending for the tablist. Might fix some issues with other mods.
text.exordium.setting.tablist.forceupdat: Force the tablist to update every possible update frame(keeping in mind the fps limit). Might fix some issues with other mods.
text.exordium.pollRate.tooltip: The rate at which the game will check for changes in UI elements. Recommended to set to your monitor's refresh rate.
text.exordium.setting.vignette.enabled.t: Enable/Disable a custom buffered vignette implementation
text.exordium.setting.vignette.fps.toolt: The maximum framerate for the vignette
text.exordium.setting.vignette.forceupda: Force the vignette to update every possible update frame(keeping in mind the fps limit). Might fix some issues with other mods.
Enable/Disable a custom buffered crosshair implementation. This will remove the 'inverted color' effect from the crosshair.
text.exordium.setting.crosshair.fps.tool: The maximum framerate for the crosshair(used during F3 mode)
text.exordium.setting.crosshair.forceupd: Force the crosshair to update every possible update frame(keeping in mind the fps limit). Might fix some issues with other mods.
